long_description: The PowerTap G3 Alloy Shimano Wheelset, which features the PowerTap G3 power meter hub to precisely measure how hard and fast you pedal, offers reliable all-around performance for dedicated cyclists. Wheelset features a PowerTap G3 rear hub, which measures cadence and power and transmits the data to an ANT+ compatible device for analysis. PowerTap G3 hub is lightweight and stiff (thanks to wide flanges) and has field-serviceable electronics; hub offers real-time power data and is accurate to within  1.5%. Wheel is built with DT Swiss Competition spokes, brass nipples and a 32h aluminum box-section rim for lasting strength and trueness. Note: you will need a CycleOps Joule or other ANT+ compatible device to use the PowerTap G3 Power Meter hub (ANT+ compatible device not included). G3 hub will not work with the CycleOps Cervo (Yellow CPU). The PowerTap G3 Alloy Shimano Wheelset includes skewers.
short_description: The PowerTap G3 Alloy Shimano Wheelset, which features the PowerTap G3 power meter hub to precisely measure how hard and fast you pedal, offers reliable all-around performance for dedicated cyclists.
